1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: In the first episode, Steve plans to open a bar on the Costa Blanca with his feisty mother-in-law and a couple of total novices leave Scotland for a B&B in France.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: A family race to open their dream bar. Two B&B owners welcome their first guests in the Dordogne. And can the newest fisherman on the Costa del Sol impress his first customers.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: In this episode, as one expat fisherman has a big catch in Cape Verde, another comes back empty handed in Spain, and a boutique Spanish hotel ventures into unchartered waters.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Can Steve and his mother-in-law impress customers with their Spanish bar? Boutique hotel owners Ray and Yvonne hold their very first wedding, and will a new baby scupper a dream.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: In this episode, novice B&B owners receive crucial feedback, can the Costa's newest fisherman make his dream a reality, and will weddings make or break a Spanish B&B.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: A classic car fan tries to persuade his reluctant wife that they should sell spare car parts in France. And two expats try to launch a new dive centre in Marbella.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Spain's newest scuba divers search for a 100-year-old British wreck at the bottom of the Med. In France, can an entrepreneur transform a run-down 19th century townhouse into a dream home.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: After 34 years of teaching, one expat faces up to being married to the boss. And a British-run scuba diving business plans to move back into UK waters.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: A new expat leaves England to turn her passion for fitness into a boot camp on the beach in Spain. And after 10 months of renovations, two expats unveil their new French townhouse.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: After years of disappointing yields, British owners of a French vineyard start their harvest. Will they turn their fortunes around? It's decision time at a British-run boot camp in Spain.

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: A blocked drain closes an expat seafood restaurant at the busiest time of year. And have two new British pub owners in Spain done enough to make a future in the sun.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

15.plot: Can two expats cope with customer complaints? Have the owners of a Spanish seafood restaurant turned things around? And will a final flurry of guests make or break a fledging French B&B.

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: A New Life in the Sun (TV Series 2016– )

imdb.title: A New Life in the Sun
akas: A New Life in the Sun (United Kingdom)
plot: Series following intrepid expats as they chase a dream life in the sun and set up new businesses abroad. Just how easy is it to start a new life, and is the grass really greener on the other side.
